attributes.action: Replace the Health Secretary, Jeremy Hunt, due to the junior doctors dispute.
attributes.additional_details: There is an ongoing dispute in the NHS concerning junior doctors in hospitals and the provision of care 7 days a week. This is very important for patients and the dispute should be resolved quickly. The Health Secretary has not been able to resolve the dispute.  A fresh person acting as Health Secretary would help to move the dispute to a resolution, whereas the current Health Secretary is an impediment to a solution.
attributes.background: The current Health Secretary, Jeremy Hunt, is an impediment to a solution of the dispute in the NHS with junior doctors in hospitals. A fresh person acting as Health Secretary would help to move the dispute to a resolution.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
